entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, `oauth_key` TEXT NOT NULL, `display_name` TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, `created` INTEGER, `modified` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_user_oauth_key
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_user_oauth_key` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`oauth_key`)

indices.name: index_user_display_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_user_display_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`display_name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`note_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, `description` TEXT, `created` INTEGER NOT NULL, `modified` INTEGER, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`user_id`) REFERENCES `user`(`user_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_note_title
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_note_title` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title`)

indices.name: index_note_created
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_note_created` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`created`)

indices.name: index_note_modified
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_note_modified` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`modified`)

indices.name: index_note_user_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_note_user_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`image_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `caption` TEXT COLLATE NOCASE, `mime_type` TEXT, `uri` TEXT NOT NULL, `created` INTEGER NOT NULL, `note_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`note_id`) REFERENCES `note`(`note_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_image_mime_type
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_image_mime_type` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`mime_type`)

indices.name: index_image_created
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_image_created` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`created`)

indices.name: index_image_note_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_image_note_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`note_id`)
